name: Nimian Legends: BrightRidge
summary:
Experience a true open world fantasy adventure. An ancient mystery has returned to the remote, wind-swept hills of BrightRidge. Only you can help two young heroes discover its secrets, in an immersive wilderness filled with rivers, waterfalls, ancient forests, and beautiful sunsets. 
 
I am a solo indie developer working on BrightRidge and it is a game from my heart. I enjoyed creating this world and I hope you enjoy exploring it:) 
 
• A true Open World - run, swim and fly anywhere 
• Shapechange into a butterfly, eagle, dragon and more 
• A beautiful natural fantasy world with touching stories and characters 
• Extensive effects, filters, and options - control time of day, and even the weather 
• Relax in Explore Mode to experience the beauty of BrightRidge without distractions 
• SpiritView let’s you observe the wildlife in its natural habitat 
• A focus on story and adventure, not violence 
• Full game: no ads or in-app purchases 
• A solo indie project, made with love 
 
Available for Android, IOS, and AppleTV
